verses.verse: A Psalm of David. Jehovah <WH3068> is my shepherd <WH7462>; I shall not want <WH2637>.
He maketh me to lie down <WH7257> in green <WH1877> pastures <WH4999>; He leadeth <WH5095> me beside still <WH4496> waters <WH4325>.
He restoreth <WH7725> my soul <WH5315>: He guideth <WH5148> me in the paths <WH4570> of righteousness <WH6664> for his name <WH8034>'s sake.

Yea <WH3212>, thou I walk through the valley <WH1516> of the shadow of death <WH6757>, I will fear <WH3372> no evil <WH7451>; for thou art with me <WH7626>; Thy rod and thy staff <WH4938>, they comfort me <WH5162>.

Thou preparest <WH6186> a table <WH7979> before <WH6440> me in the presence of mine enemies <WH6887>: Thou hast anointed <WH1878> my head <WH7218> with oil <WH8081>; My cup <WH3563> runneth over <WH7310>.

Surely goodness <WH2896> and lovingkindness <WH2617> shall follow <WH7291> me all the days <WH3117> of my life <WH2416>; And I shall dwell <WH3427> in the house <WH1004> of Jehovah <WH3068> for ever <WH753>.
